verses.text: \w There|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ramathaimsophim, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* Elcana, \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jeroham|strong="H3395"\w*, \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Eliu, \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Thohu, \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Suph, \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w Ephraimite|strong="H0673"\w*:

\w And|strong="H0802"\w* \w he|strong="H0802"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*, \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H0802"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* Anna, \w and|strong="H0802"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H0802"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w other|strong="H0259"\w* Phenenna. Phenenna \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w children|strong="H3206"\w*: \w but|strong="H1961"\w* Anna \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w children|strong="H3206"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w out|strong="H8147"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* upon \w the|strong="H3068"\w* appointed \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* adore \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w offer|strong="H5927"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* Silo. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Heli, Ophni \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Phinees, \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Elcana \w offered|strong="H2076"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* Phenenna \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, \w portions|strong="H4490"\w*:

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* Anna \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w portion|strong="H4490"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* sorrow, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w loved|strong="H0157"\w* Anna. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* \w up|strong="H5462"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w womb|strong="H7358"\w*.

\w Her|strong="H5462"\w* rival \w also|strong="H1571"\w* afflicted \w her|strong="H5462"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w troubled|strong="H7481"\w* \w her|strong="H5462"\w* exceedingly, insomuch \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* upbraided \w her|strong="H5462"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* \w up|strong="H5462"\w* \w her|strong="H5462"\w* \w womb|strong="H7358"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w thus|strong="H3651"\w* \w she|strong="H3808"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w every|strong="H8141"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, \w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w time|strong="H1767"\w* \w returned|strong="H5927"\w* \w that|strong="H3651"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w thus|strong="H3651"\w* \w she|strong="H3808"\w* \w provoked|strong="H3707"\w* \w her|strong="H0398"\w*: \w but|strong="H3808"\w* Anna \w wept|strong="H1058"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0559"\w* Elcana \w her|strong="H0398"\w* \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w her|strong="H0398"\w*: Anna, \w why|strong="H4100"\w* weepest thou? \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w why|strong="H4100"\w* dost thou \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*? \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w why|strong="H4100"\w* dost thou afflict thy \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*? \w Am|strong="H0595"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* thee \w than|strong="H3808"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*?

\w So|strong="H6965"\w* Anna \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w she|strong="H6965"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w drunk|strong="H8354"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* Silo: \w And|strong="H6965"\w* Heli \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w sitting|strong="H3427"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* stool, \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w door|strong="H4201"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*:

\w As|strong="H5315"\w* Anna \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w heart|strong="H5315"\w* full \w of|strong="H3068"\w* grief, \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w prayed|strong="H6419"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, shedding many tears,

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w she|strong="H0518"\w* \w made|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w vow|strong="H5088"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w if|strong="H0518"\w* thou wilt \w look|strong="H7200"\w* \w down|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* affliction \w of|strong="H0376"\w* thy \w servant|strong="H0519"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* wilt \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w mindful|strong="H2142"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* thy \w handmaid|strong="H0519"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* wilt \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* thy \w servant|strong="H0519"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w child|strong="H2233"\w*: \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w life|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* razor \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w pass|strong="H1961"\w*, \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w* prayers \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* Heli \w observed|strong="H8104"\w* \w her|strong="H1961"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H8085"\w* Anna \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w only|strong="H7535"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* moved, \w but|strong="H7535"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* all. Heli therefore \w thought|strong="H3820"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w drunk|strong="H7910"\w*,

\w And|strong="H3196"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w*: \w How|strong="H4970"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* wilt thou, be \w drunk|strong="H7937"\w*? digest \w a|strong="H5921"\w* little \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H3196"\w* thou hast \w taken|strong="H5493"\w* \w too|strong="H5921"\w* \w much|strong="H5921"\w*.

Anna answering, \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Not|strong="H3808"\w* \w so|strong="H3808"\w*, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w am|strong="H0595"\w* \w an|strong="H6440"\w* exceeding unhappy \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w drunk|strong="H8354"\w* \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H6440"\w* \w strong|strong="H7941"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w poured|strong="H8210"\w* \w out|strong="H8210"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

Count \w not|strong="H0408"\w* thy \w handmaid|strong="H0519"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w one|strong="H0408"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* Belial: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w abundance|strong="H7230"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* sorrow \w and|strong="H6440"\w* grief \w have|strong="H1323"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w now|strong="H2008"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H6030"\w* Heli \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w*: Go \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*: \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w grant|strong="H5414"\w* thee thy \w petition|strong="H7596"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* thou hast \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0398"\w* \w she|strong="H3808"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Would|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w God|strong="H0559"\w* thy handmaid \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w grace|strong="H2580"\w* \w in|strong="H0802"\w* thy \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*. \w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w went|strong="H6440"\w* \w on|strong="H1870"\w* \w her|strong="H0802"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w ate|strong="H0398"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w her|strong="H0802"\w* \w countenance|strong="H6440"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* changed.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w rose|strong="H7925"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* worshipped \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w at|strong="H0413"\w* Ramatha. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* Elcana \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* Anna \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w pass|strong="H1961"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w about|strong="H1961"\w*, Anna \w conceived|strong="H2029"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w bore|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Elcana \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w offer|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* solemn \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w vow|strong="H5088"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* Anna \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w her|strong="H7200"\w* \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w child|strong="H5288"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w weaned|strong="H1580"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H0376"\w* \w carry|strong="H5927"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H0376"\w* \w appear|strong="H7200"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w may|strong="H0376"\w* \w abide|strong="H3427"\w* \w always|strong="H5769"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* Elcana \w her|strong="H0802"\w* \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w her|strong="H0802"\w*: \w Do|strong="H6213"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* seemeth \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w stay|strong="H3427"\w* \w till|strong="H5704"\w* thou wean \w him|strong="H0853"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* pray \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H0376"\w* \w fulfill|strong="H6965"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w*. \w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w stayed|strong="H3427"\w* \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w home|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w gave|strong="H0559"\w* \w her|strong="H0802"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w suck|strong="H3243"\w*, \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w she|strong="H2896"\w* \w weaned|strong="H1580"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* after \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w weaned|strong="H1580"\w* \w him|strong="H0935"\w*, \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w carried|strong="H5927"\w* \w him|strong="H0935"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w her|strong="H0935"\w*, \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* calves, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* bushels \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w flour|strong="H7058"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* bottle \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w him|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* Silo. \w Now|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w child|strong="H5288"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w yet|strong="H3068"\w* very \w young|strong="H5288"\w*:

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H0935"\w* immolated \w a|strong="H0935"\w* calf, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* offered \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w child|strong="H5288"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Heli.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Anna \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* beseech thee, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w as|strong="H5315"\w* thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* liveth, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w stood|strong="H5324"\w* \w before|strong="H0413"\w* thee \w here|strong="H2088"\w* \w praying|strong="H6419"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w For|strong="H0413"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w child|strong="H5288"\w* \w did|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w pray|strong="H6419"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w granted|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w petition|strong="H7596"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*.
